purpose: To provide a comprehensive platform for learning and mastering applied AI concepts through hands-on projects and tutorials.
principle: Focused on practical applications of AI, emphasizing experimentation and real-world use cases to facilitate understanding.
reusability: Designed to be modular, allowing users to reuse components and code snippets across different projects and experiments.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may result in incomplete features and potential bugs. Not all concepts may be fully explored or documented.
name: AI-Engineering.academy
description: Mastering Applied AI, One Concept at a Time
